SELECT p.iproject_id, -- 시공 프로젝트 ID p.iproject_title, -- 시공 사례 제목 p.iproject_description, -- 시공 사례 설명
( SELECT iphoto_filename FROM in_photos ph WHERE ph.iphoto_project_id = p.iproject_id ORDER BY ph.iphoto_id ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) AS image_filename
FROM in_projects p ORDER BY p.iproject_id DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
